ProductInfo.Features:
MTECH new 7 inch 2-in-1 2-in-1 PHONE + TABLET = PHABLET. Support Dual SIM Card.
Dual Core CPU 1.2GHZ * 2 runs Android 4.2 more stable and smooth.
2G GSM 50/900/1800/1900 and 3G WCDMA 850/2100MHz Android Smartphone; Supports Dual SIM card, compatible with T-Mobile and AT&T;
Build-in 3G, Bluetooth and Wifi 802.11 b/g/n compatible keeps you connected anywhere you go.
Dual Camera: Rear Camera 2.0 Mega Pixel. Front Camera 0.3 mega pixel
ProductInfo.Name: Mtech Mtp268 7" Dual Core 2g 3g Gsm & Dual Sim Card and Bluetooth Android 4.2 High Definition Capacitive Touchscreen Tablet Smartphone Unlocked / Dual CPU 1.2ghz * 2 / 512mb DDR / 4g Flash / Dual Camera (White)
